sentences.en: A cover letter should never exceed one page; often a far shorter letter will suffice.
sentences.cn: 附信不应超过一页，通常来说，一封相对非常简短的信就足够了。

sentences.en: Automation would bring a shorter, more flexible working week.
sentences.cn: 自动化会使工作周缩短，也更为灵活。

sentences.en: Bess was self-conscious about being shorter than her two friends.
sentences.cn: 贝丝因比她的两个朋友个子都矮而感到很不自在。

sentences.en: Blue light has a shorter wavelength than red.
sentences.cn: 蓝光的波长比红光的短。

sentences.en: If you set the boy among those tall children, he looks even shorter.
sentences.cn: 你若让这孩子站在高大的孩子中, 他看上去显得更矮.

sentences.en: Jack is shorter than Tom by a head.
Many factories are switching over to a shorter working week.
sentences.cn: 很多工厂都在减少每周的工作日数.

sentences.en: Shorter hemlines are back in this season.
sentences.cn: 本季又重新时兴较短的衣裙。

sentences.en: Tactical nuclear weapons have shorter ranges.
sentences.cn: 战术核武器的威力范围较小。

sentences.en: The articles are noticeably shorter with strong headlines and graphics.
sentences.cn: 这些文章明显短了许多，并且配上了醒目的标题和图表。

sentences.en: The car is some 40mm shorter than its predecessor.
sentences.cn: 这辆轿车比原先的车型短了约40毫米。

sentences.en: The days get shorter after the Summer Solstice.
sentences.cn: 过了夏至,天就开始变短.

sentences.en: The idea is to finish a job in a shorter time as measured by an external clock, even if at the cost of more hardware and programming complexity.
sentences.cn: 其思想是按照外部时钟的步调在更短的时间内完成一项工作，即便要以更复杂的硬件和编程为代价也在所不惜。

sentences.en: The shorter children are to sit at the front.
sentences.cn: 个子矮的孩子坐在前边.

sentences.en: Today's slightly shorter race could well help to tip the scales in his favour.
sentences.cn: 今天距离稍短的赛跑可能会对他占据优势大有助益。

sentences.en: Why don't you take a leaf out of Anne's book and have your hair cut shorter?
sentences.cn: 你为什么不效法安妮,也把头发剪短些 呢 ?

trans.tran_cn: 短的( short的比较级 )，不够，短缺的，短期的
